name: SSG Power
tag_list: solar--energy, solar-products, solar-panels, solar-batteries, soalr-inverter, solar-chargecontrollers, solar-led, solar-package, solar-pcu, solar-waterheater
overview:
SSG Power Private Limited is founded in early 2012 to spread the renewable energy to decrease carbon emission in the earth. Our aim is to save the earth from global warming.

Its our responsibility to make awareness of Global Warming and to inspire the entire world to use solar products to save their future generation.

To overcome the power failures with affordable solar products.

Also to provide the world with high quality products for which we have given our entire efforts to manufacture with care.

SSG Power, which is a part of a powerful group named ‘SSG Group Of Companies’ manufacturers a wide range of Solar Equipments namely

Solar Power Packs, Solar Panels, Solar Batteries, Solar Inverter,Solar Water Heater, Solar Street Light, LED lights, Solar PCU, Hybrid Solar,

Complete Solar Packages and other customized solar Products.

We have experience of over 100s of installation in the field of Solar Power Plants.

What ever your interest may be in solar power, choosing us as your energy solutions, makes a perfect sense.

We have been in the industry for more than a years, so our experience in manufacturing, designing and installation will fulfill your needs and also you can trust our band for the same.

We are having excellent service set up, starting from manufacturing to customer service. This makes us to deliver outstanding quality and innovative product line to our customers.
